type_entities.description: Unbounded is the product of a joint collaboration between Studio Koto, NaN, Parity Technologies and Web3 Foundation for Polkadot Network [GitHub]. Released under the SIL Open Font License 1.1. Comes in six (upright) weights as well as a single variable font, with support for Latin (incl. Pan-African) and Cyrillic.
type_entities.name: Unbounded

type_entities.description: Comes in 64 numbered styles: 8 widths (in three groups; Narrow, Standard, Wide), each with 8 (upright) weights.
type_entities.name: Field Gothic

type_entities.description: Designed as a custom typeface for The Khudozhestvenny Cinema in Moscow, December 2020. Released as a retail typeface in September 2022, supporting Cyrillic and Latin. One weight, no lowercase.
type_entities.name: CoFo Cinema1909

type_entities.description: A single style issued as an incomplete version through Commercial Type’s Vault in August 2022. “An homage to @typeentity:7340@ by Miguel Reyes, started as a custom project that was cancelled amid a corporate reshuffle, and later finished for Richard Turley’s guest editorship of It’s Nice That in August 2022.” [Commercial Type]
type_entities.name: Lovesong

type_entities.description: A digitization and extension of Otto Naegele’s @typeentity:39863@, or Reklameschrift Bombe (Ludwig & Mayer, 1908). Comes in two versions, A and B. In the latter, some blackletter-style letterforms were modernized. Made available exclusively to supporters of the community websites Typography.guru and Typografie.info.
type_entities.name: FDI Reklameschrift

type_entities.description: Design started in 2017, expanded with lowercase in 2021–22, and released via the Commercial Type Vault in August 2022.
type_entities.name: Ergon

type_entities.description: Designed in 2016 for the Helsingin Sanomat newspaper. Made available viathe Commercial Type Vault in 2022.
type_entities.name: Sanomat Slab

type_entities.description: Inspired by Robert Stöcklin’s lettering for his poster design for the Mustermesse Basel 1924. Started in 2017 and expanded in 2019. Released by Nguyen Gobber in August 2022.
type_entities.name: Lucifer

type_entities.description: Comes in six weights plus italics, all additionally available in a Spike variant with diagonal terminals for some glyphs. See also @typeentity:202210@ with horizontal contrast. Also offered in variable font format.
type_entities.name: Takeoff A

type_entities.description: Comes in four weights plus italics, all additionally available in a Spike variant with diagonal terminals for some glyphs. See also @typeentity:202209@ with conventional contrast. Also offered in variable font format.
type_entities.name: Takeoff B

type_entities.description: A revival of @typedesigner:1284@’s @typeentity:41788@ (MS&J, 1878), released in August 2022 to members of the Font of the Month Club. The interpretation mostly follows the proportions of Glyptic’s two-line pica cut (24pt). Comes with ornaments and alternates for ‘O’, ‘K’ and word space.
type_entities.name: Glyptic DJR

type_entities.description: Comes in 6 weights plus a dingbat style, Ohno Casual Textile. Also available in variable font format with axes for weight and contrast.
type_entities.name: Ohno Casual
